review: Definitely recommend Dr. Jagadish Chinnappa with the vast experience he has.  He gets to the core of the issue and gives best advice

The doctor is very very rude. His staff are even worse than the doctor. They are not helpful, extremely rude and unprofessional and talk to you with no respect and act like they are doing you favor. He charges Rs.1000 for consultation. ** ******** ** ******* *** ******* **** **** ** ***** ******* ** *** **** ** ** ******** ** *** ****** *** ****** ** ***** ** ***** **** *** ****** ***** *** ** *** ******* **** ********** ** ** ************* ***********

Since our baby was born in Manipal, we visit this hospital once in a while for distinctive medical assistance. With Dr. Jagadish Chinnappa, it was an excellent session. His advice and cooperation have fulfilled all our medical requirements. We are happy with the experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Paediatrics - Ortho,disorders of calcium and phosphorous metabolism,All Pediatric Problems ,
review:
*** ******** ** **** * *** ** *** My daughter is treated by him since she was 6 months. We were in Koramangla at that time and by stoke of luck we met Dr. Jagdeesh Chinappa. She is 13 years now and we have moved to Marathahalli, but whenever I am worried about any condition of her, he is my go to point. He has treated my daughter for normal viral fever, a dislocated elbow joint, EPV viral infection, growth disorder, knee pain, vomiting etc and whenever I go to him I am so satisfied and contended on my way back home. I am extremely happy and satisfied with Dr. Jagdeesh and would whole heartedly recommend him to all...

God bless him...

review:
Very good doctor and friendly person. 
Perfect diagnosis and assessment of illness are plus points. 
Thanks sir

Since I knew him for the past 20 years, I decided to consult him for my baby. Now it has been three months of satisfied consultations with him. I always use practo to book the appointments. So I have experienced a smooth and quick sessions each time. The doctor is very considerate. He is helping us with the needful advice. I am happy to recommend him to all.
